ing: 1/2 cup creamy salad dressing (e.g. Miracle WhipÂ®)
n: Spinach Salad with Poppy Seed Dressing
des: "A colorful mix of baby greens, mandarin oranges, and almonds is topped with a sweet and tangy poppy seed dressing."
ins: Make the poppy seed dressing by whisking together the creamy salad dressing, vinegar, sugar, and poppy seeds; set aside. Arrange the spinach leaves, mixed salad greens, oranges, onion, and almonds onto individual salad plates. Drizzle with poppy seed dressing to serve.
